control.name: cbRowFieldValuesExportRule
control.description: Specifies the type to which the row field values are converted before they are exported to a ChartControl.

control.name: seCellZeroValueThreshold
control.description: Specifies the minimum data cell value passed to a chart. The PivotGridControl.CustomChartDataSourceData event is handled to prepare data to be displayed in a ChartControl.

control.name: comboChartType
control.description: Sets the type of a chart.

control.name: checkShowPointLabels
control.description: Specifies whether to show labels for a series.
